title: Bookmarks metadata
description: Defines additional information about standalone bookmarks or groups of related bookmarks.

$schema.description: Defines the schema to use for an item.

SingleBookmarkMetadata.description: Defines a bookmark that is not part of a group (standalone bookmark).

name.description: Name of the bookmark - use if not under a specific group. Should be unique across the report.

BookmarkGroupMetadata.description: Defines a group of related bookmarks.

name.description: Name of the bookmark group - unique across the report.

children.description: Name of the bookmarks under this group.
